value.name: Hometown Heroes: Following Duko’s pawprints
value.description: said Border Patrol Agent Esteban Martinez. Esteban has been a border patrol agent for over a decade —primarily as a k-9 handler. Anti is one of hundreds of k-9 officers who continues the legacy ...

value.name: Teen shot to death in Little Village
value.description: CHICAGO Police say Esteban Martinez was shot in the 3000-block of South Avers. There's no word on the circumstances surrounding the shooting. Martinez was pronounced dead at Mount Sinai Hospital ...

value.name: Traffic stop leads to arrest
value.description: Esteban-Martinez, 35, of Fremont was arrested on suspicion of driving while revoked following a traffic stop in the 100 block of Schuyler Avenue, Fremont Police reported.
